statements: SELECT player_name, interaction_type FROM player_behavior WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_behavior WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_behavior WHERE player_id = 12345;
SELECT DISTINCT player_name FROM player_behavior ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM player_behavior GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_interactions > 10;
SELECT player_name, interaction_type FROM player_behavior WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_name, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_behavior WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_behavior WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-02-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY player_id, interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM player_behavior WHERE interaction_type = 'login';
SELECT player_name AS player, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM player_behavior GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_interactions > 3 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT username, level FROM Players WHERE level > 10;
SELECT player_id, username FROM Players ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT player_id, experience FROM Players WHERE experience < 500;
SELECT * FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'login' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, level, experience FROM Players WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY level DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR username LIKE 'Z%';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM Interactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_interactions > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;

SELECT Players.player_id, Players.username, Interactions.interaction_type, Interactions.interaction_timestamp FROM Players JOIN Interactions ON Players.player_id = Interactions.player_id ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(level) AS avg_level, AVG(experience) AS avg_experience FROM Players;
SELECT player_id, interaction_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM PlayerInteractions;
SELECT * FROM PlayerProgress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT interaction_id, timestamp FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'battle' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, level_completed FROM PlayerProgress WHERE level_completed >= 5 ORDER BY level_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT player_id, level_completed, progress_percentage FROM PlayerProgress ORDER BY level_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_id, timestamp FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE player_id = 'abcdefg' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, level FROM players WHERE experience > 1000;
SELECT player_name, start_time FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_time;
SELECT player_name, reward_type, reward_amount FROM player_rewards WHERE reward_amount > 50 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM players WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_name, level FROM players WHERE experience BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT player_name, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_name, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, total_points FROM players ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN games ON player_progress.game_id = games.game_id WHERE game_type = 'Adventure';

SELECT player_name, game_name, current_level FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN games ON player_progress.game_id = games.game_id ORDER BY current_level ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, preferred_difficulty FROM players JOIN player_preferences ON players.player_id = player_preferences.player_id WHERE preferred_difficulty = 'Hard';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, total_points FROM players WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, progress_percent FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE current_level >= 3 ORDER BY progress_percent DESC;

SELECT player_name, game_genre, preferred_difficulty FROM players JOIN player_preferences ON players.player_id = player_preferences.player_id WHERE preferred_difficulty = 'Hard' ORDER BY player_name ASC, game_genre DESC;

SELECT player_name, game_type, interaction_type FROM players JOIN interactions ON players.player_id = interactions.player_id JOIN games ON interactions.game_id = games.game_id WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY game_type ASC, interaction_timestamp DESC;
